      FacultyListCtl is a controller servlet that handles the listing, searching, paging, deletion, and navigation operations for Faculty entities.

      ForgetPasswordCtl is a controller servlet that handles the "Forget Password" functionality.

      Get Marksheet functionality Controller.
      class  LoginCtl
      LoginCtl is a controller servlet that manages user login, logout, and sign up functionalities.
      class  MarksheetCtl
      MarksheetCtl is a servlet controller that handles operations related to marksheet management such as preload student list, validate form data, populate bean, add, update marksheet records and forward to the appropriate view.
      class  MarksheetListCtl
      MarksheetListCtl is a servlet controller that handles listing, searching, pagination, deletion, and navigation operations for marksheets.
      class  MarksheetMeritListCtl
      MarksheetMeritListCtl is a servlet controller responsible for displaying the merit list of marksheets.
      class  MyProfileCtl
      MyProfileCtl is a servlet controller class that handles the user's profile management such as viewing and updating user profile information.
      class  RoleCtl
      RoleCtl class handles the operations for Role management such as adding, updating, validating and displaying Role data.
      class  RoleListCtl
      RoleListCtl class handles the listing, searching, pagination, and deletion of Role records.
      class  StudentCtl
      StudentCtl class is a controller servlet to handle student add, update, and display operations.
      class  StudentListCtl
      StudentListCtl controller handles the listing, searching, and deletion of Student records.
      class  SubjectCtl
      Controller to handle operations for Subject entity like Add, Update, Reset, and Cancel.
      class  SubjectListCtl
      Controller to handle Subject List operations such as preload, search, pagination, and delete actions.
      class  TimeTableCtl
      Controller class to handle TimeTable operations such as preload, validate, populate bean, and manage HTTP requests for adding, updating, or displaying timetable records.
      class  TimeTableListCtl
      Controller class to handle operations related to listing timetables.
